## TGlBufferBitKeys type

keys to buffer bits such as `DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TGlBufferBitKeys = "COLOR_BUFFER_BIT" | "DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT" | "STENCIL_BUFFER_BIT";
```
